languages.text: Отступили монахи прочь за стены свои, и ударили в вокс-набат, и затворили врата, и повелели оружной страже над теми вратами бдети и всякого, кто к ним подступит, погубити.
The monks fled beyond their walls, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.
languages.original_text: Отступили монахи прочь за стены свои, и ударили в вокс-набат, и затворили врата, и повелели оружной страже над теми вратами бдети и всякого, кто к ним подступит, погубити.

traits.locale_text: They fled beyond their walls in fear, and rung the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.
They fled beyond their walls in fear, and rung the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.
They fled beyond their walls in fear, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.
They fled beyond their walls in fear, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.
The monks fled beyond their walls, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.

languages.text: Los monjes huyeron allende los muros, hicieron sonar la vocoalarma, cerraron la puerta y ordenaron a los guardias armados que vigilaran la puerta, abatiendo a cuantos se aproximaran a ella.
languages.original_text: The monks fled beyond their walls, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.

traits.locale_text: Huyeron allende los muros, atemorizados, hicieron sonar la vocoalarma, cerraron la puerta y ordenaron a los guardias armados que vigilaran la puerta, abatiendo a cuantos se aproximaran a ella.

languages.text: 僧侣们撤退到了修道院的高墙之内，拉响了音阵警报，关闭了大门，并命令武装守卫看好大门，杀死一切胆敢接近大门的人。
languages.original_text: The monks fled beyond their walls, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.

traits.locale_text: 他们惊恐地逃到了修道院高墙之外，拉响了音阵警报，关闭了大门，并命令武装守卫看好大门，杀死一切胆敢接近大门的人。

languages.text: 修道士たちは防壁をよじ登って逃げ出し、ヴォクス警報を鳴らして門を閉じた。武装した衛兵に門を監視して、近づく者は皆殺しにするよう命じた。
languages.original_text: The monks fled beyond their walls, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.

traits.locale_text: 修道士たちは防壁をよじ登って逃げ出し、ヴォクス警報を鳴らして門を閉じた。武装した衛兵に門を監視して、近づく者は皆殺しにするよう命じた。

languages.text: Die Mönche flohen hinter ihre Mauern, aktivierten das Vox-Alarum, schlossen das Tor und befahlen den bewaffneten Wachen, das Tor zu schützen und jeden zu töten, der sich ihm näherte.
languages.original_text: The monks fled beyond their walls, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.

traits.locale_text: Sie flohen panisch hinter ihre Mauern, aktivierten das Vox-Alarum, schlossen das Tor und befahlen den bewaffneten Wachen, das Tor zu schützen und jeden zu töten, der sich ihm näherte.

languages.text: Les moines se retranchent derrière les murs. Ils referment les portes et sonnent l'alarme-vox, avant d'ordonner aux gardes armés de surveiller les accès et de tuer tous ceux qui s'en approcheraient.
languages.original_text: The monks fled beyond their walls, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.

traits.locale_text: Effrayés, l'on se retranche derrière les murs, l'on referme les portes et sonne l'alarme-vox, avant d'ordonner aux gardes armés de surveiller les accès et de tuer tous ceux qui s'en approcheraient.

languages.text: Keşişler, duvarlarının arkasına kaçıp voks alarmını çaldılar, kapıları kapattılar ve silahlı muhafızlara kapıyı gözetleyip yaklaşan herkesi öldürme emri verdiler.
languages.original_text: The monks fled beyond their walls, and rang the vox-alarum, and shut the gate, and commanded the armed guards to keep watch over that gate, slaying any who approached.

traits.locale_text: Keşişler, duvarlarının arkasına kaçıp voks alarmını çaldılar, kapıları kapattılar ve silahlı muhafızlara kapıyı gözetleyip yaklaşan herkesi öldürme emri verdiler.
